com.digi.xbee.api

Class RemoteRaw802Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.digi.xbee.api.AbstractXBeeDevice
      • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteXBeeDevice
        • com.digi.xbee.api.RemoteRaw802Device

  • public class RemoteRaw802Device
extends RemoteXBeeDevice
    This class represents a remote 802.15.4 device.
    See Also:
    RemoteXBeeDevice, RemoteDigiMeshDevice, RemoteDigiPointDevice, RemoteZigBeeDevice

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteRaw802Device

        public RemoteRaw802Device(Raw802Device localXBeeDevice,
                  XBee16BitAddress addr16)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteRaw802Device object with the given local Raw802Device which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local 802.15.4 device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote 802.15.4 device.
        addr16 - The 16-bit address to identify this remote 802.15.4 device.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr16 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress

      • RemoteRaw802Device

        public RemoteRaw802Device(Raw802Device localXBeeDevice,
                  XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteRaw802Device object with the given local Raw802Device which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local 802.15.4 device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote 802.15.4 device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote 802.15.4 device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress

      • RemoteRaw802Device

        public RemoteRaw802Device(XBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                  XBee16BitAddress addr16)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteRaw802Device object interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local 802.15.4 device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote 802.15.4 device.
        addr16 - The 16-bit address to identify this remote 802.15.4 device.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.RAW_802_15_4.
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr16 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress

      • RemoteRaw802Device

        public RemoteRaw802Device(XBeeDevice localXBeeDevice,
                  XBee64BitAddress addr64,
                  XBee16BitAddress addr16,
                  String id)
        Class constructor. Instantiates a new RemoteRaw802Device object with the given local XBeeDevice which contains the connection interface to be used.
        Parameters:
        localXBeeDevice - The local XBee device that will behave as connection interface to communicate with this remote 802.15.4 device.
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to identify this remote 802.15.4 device.
        addr16 - The 16-bit address to identify this remote 802.15.4 device. It might be null.
        id - The node identifier of this remote 802.15.4 device. It might be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if localXBeeDevice.isRemote() == true or if localXBeeDevice.getXBeeProtocol() != XBeeProtocol.RAW_802_15_4
        NullPointerException - if localXBeeDevice == null or if addr64 == null.
        See Also:
        XBee16BitAddress, XBee64BitAddress

    • Method Detail

      • getAssociationIndicationStatus

        public AssociationIndicationStatus getAssociationIndicationStatus()
                                                           throws TimeoutException,
                                                                  XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the current association status of this XBee device.

        It indicates occurrences of errors during the last association request.

        Returns:
        The association indication status of the XBee device.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout getting the association indication status.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        AbstractXBeeDevice.forceDisassociate(), AssociationIndicationStatus

      • getXBeeProtocol

        public XBeeProtocol getXBeeProtocol()
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns the XBee Protocol of this XBee device.

        To refresh this value use the AbstractXBeeDevice.readDeviceInfo() method.

        Overrides:
        getXBeeProtocol in class AbstractXBeeDevice
        Returns:
        The XBee device protocol.
        See Also:
        XBeeProtocol

      • set16BitAddress

        public void set16BitAddress(XBee16BitAddress xbee16BitAddress)
                     throws TimeoutException,
                            XBeeException
        Description copied from class: AbstractXBeeDevice
        Configures the 16-bit address (network address) of this XBee device with the provided one.
        Parameters:
        xbee16BitAddress - The new 16-bit address.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if there is a timeout setting the address.
        XBeeException - if there is any other XBee related exception.
        See Also:
        AbstractXBeeDevice.get16BitAddress(), XBee16BitAddress

      • set64BitAddress

        public void set64BitAddress(XBee64BitAddress addr64)
        Sets the XBee64BitAddress of this remote 802.15.4 device.
        Parameters:
        addr64 - The 64-bit address to be set to the device.
        See Also:
        XBee64BitAddress
